https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gRWVf3InNlIlFT3WB9MnFdOwcYQ.jpg An American bartender and his prostitute girlfriend go on a road trip through the Mexican underworld to collect a $1 million bounty on the head of a dead gigolo. Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
